KSL pointed out a mistake in my last post, so I'll correct it here. My last 
post with Zardus and Reptilica is void.

::Reptilica/Zardus::

Pain streams through Reptilica's circuits as a blade emerges out of his 
chest, nearly passing through his spark. He shudders, sliding off the blade 
and rolling down the ramp, his internal repairs taking over as he reverts 
into Beast Mode, hitting the ground with a dull thud.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus calmly watches Reptilica make his exit from the shuttle, chuckling 
quetly. How these bots treated Reptilica amused him. Reptilica had been 
fairly arrogant when Zardus had first met him, Reptilica could use some more 
of that treatment.

"What about?" he says, his red optics watching the Vok carefully.
